frontmatter.title: Offline installation of Workflow Process Service Trial

internal.content:
---
title: Offline installation of Workflow Process Service Trial
---

If you want to install offline, you must first find a computer that can access the Internet to pull the Workflow Process Service Trial image from the IBM Cloud Registry. Then, retag the image as the following and upload the image to your local registry:

```
<local_registry>/workflow-ps-trial:23.0.2
```

Before you start the environment, update the related `docker-compose.yml` file. In the `pc/image` section, update the registry to your local registry.

frontmatter.title: Offline installation of Workflow Process Service Trial

MdxNode.rawBody:
---
title: Offline installation of Workflow Process Service Trial
---

If you want to install offline, you must first find a computer that can access the Internet to pull the Workflow Process Service Trial image from the IBM Cloud Registry. Then, retag the image as the following and upload the image to your local registry:

```
<local_registry>/workflow-ps-trial:23.0.2
```

Before you start the environment, update the related `docker-compose.yml` file. In the `pc/image` section, update the registry to your local registry.
